__TOC__

=== Global Bug Jam / BarCamp Miami 2009 ===

** <nowiki>[[DanTrevino]]</nowiki> brought up a discussion about having the team participate in the Global Bug Jam and meet-up for Face2Face/Dinner. And also the possibility of some team members attending Barcamp Miami on the 21st and 22nd of February. There was also some discussion on needing to find a team point-of-contact for organizing events in or around Miami. 

=== Florida Linux Show 2009 Jacksonville ===

** <nowiki>[[itnet7]]</nowiki> discussed with the team information about the Florida Linux Show and how the team could get involved. <nowiki>[[DanTrevino]]</nowiki> asked for volunteers to help with the booth, demos, and installs.

=== Possibility of Team Bug Jam in the Midst ===

** <nowiki>[[pak33m]]</nowiki> brought up the fact that he would like to do a team bug jam outside of the Global Bug Jam in Miami.

=== Michael and Michelle begin lurking #ubuntu-us-fl ===

** <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~mhall-lakeland|mhall119]]</nowiki> came to the meeting and mentioned his project Qimo and was looking for ideas on where to host the .iso and project.
